issue.title: ROS Network is not working properly from the field computer to the local computer

content.raw:
Hi Carlos.
Isn't is the case:
**Local OCU:** 

```
#!script

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://10.0.0.51:11311
ROS_HOSTNAME=localhost
ROS_DISTRO=fuerte
ROS_IP=11.8.0.2
ROS_ETC_DIR=/opt/ros/fuerte/etc/ros

```
**Field computer:**

```
#!script

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://10.0.0.51:11311
ROS_DISTRO=fuerte
ROS_IP=10.0.0.52
ROS_ETC_DIR=/opt/ros/fuerte/etc/ros

```
What should I change?
